data.name: YoChat
data.description: Collaboratively engineered YoChat, a fullstack chat application, utilizing ReactJs and ChakraUI for dynamic UI design, ExpressJS and RESTAPI for robust backend development.

data.name: Meal Connect
data.description: Developed a platform for the DEVSOCâ€™24 hackathon at VIT using Node.js, Express.js, MongoDB, HTML, CSS, and Bootstrap to streamline coordination between event organizers and NGOs

data.name: Book-N-Park
data.description: Crafted Book-N-Park, An IoT based Smart Parking System utilizing Raspberry Pi and a Fullstack parking application leveraging ReactJs, MaterialII for UI, ExpressJS and RESTAPI. Utilized SocketIO for real-time logs, alongside MongoDB for data management, Designed to streamline parking at my college campus, allowing users to register vehicles, reserve slots, and mitigate traffic and parking disorganization effectively.

data.name: Weather Forcasting
data.description: Utilized ARIMA for time-series forecasting to advise on agricultural irrigation and suggest efficient irrigation methods
